traits.Amphibious: The krasis can breathe air and water.

actions.Multiattack: The krasis makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.Claws: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.
